content: a versatile little capelet knit in the round from the top down the scalloped edge at the top is worked with decreases quick to knit and easy to wear difficulty level intermediate size one size fits most 13 depth one size fits most longer length 16 depth yarn 1 2 skein s bridle trails dk from serial knitters dyehouse or 250 500 yards dk weight yarn needle 24 circular us size 10 5 needles 60cm size 6 5mm gauge 14 sts x 18 row = 4 x 4 10 cm x 10 cm 1 http //www slowcrawl com/
